thread.title: Restaurants create funny signs for naughty children | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Restaurants create funny signs for naughty children | Daily Mail Online

author: Esra Gurkan For Mailonline
title: Restaurants create funny signs for naughty children | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share A warning sign says that children not kept in check will in fact be sold to the circus Restaurant owners have made all sorts of tongue in cheek threats on the funny signs This restaurant was so serious that they went to the effort of creating a sign on the computer and printing it out before putting it on display A lot of parents might just be tempted to take this establishment up on their offer to trade in children for tasty donuts Child-free diners might well appreciate these joke warnings more than they're willing to let on If your child disappears from view then they might just be turned into a pie at this restaurant Parents brave enough to take noisy kids along to a restaurant could end up going home without them A notice to all children makes it clear that there will be no crying or screaming in their establishment at any time - and that goes for the grown ups too A grill house says that naughty children will be turned into burgers while another says that unattended children will be given wild promises about what Santa Claus will bring them A lot of children might start running away from their parents if they realise that they might be given a free kitten as a result Do you want your children to be served as sausage? Don't let them out of your sight in this establishment if not Oaklands welcomes customers but warns that naughty children will be composted if they run in the garden nursery Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
